FilterItemPortable.Name: Ano/Cliente
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="ANOENTREGA"> <FieldDefinitionName>IntegerFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2" FieldName="EMPRESA"> <FieldDefinitionName>AssociationFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <Properties>A.HANDLE IN(SELECT B.EMPRESA FROM TR_DIRFPUBLICACAOCOMPROVANTES B WHERE B.PESSOA = (SELECT USU.PESSOA FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS USU WHERE USU.HANDLE = @USUARIO) )</Properties> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
